title: Untitled, recto and verso [man wearing knickers, seen from back, recto; portrait of an old man (crossed out), verso]
description: recto:  standing man, with a long walking stick, seen from back, wearing knickers and a short jacket with a pleated collar; verso:  unfinished portrait of an old man with a long white beard wearing a cap--crossed out in graphite
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
